DOC.brief_title: Decision Impact Study Measure Influence DECIPHER Treatment Recommendations
DOC.detailed_description: The primary secondary objective assess retrospectively select prostate cancer patient treat radical prostatectomy one adverse pathological feature ( APFs )
DOC.criteria: Criteria ( Participant enrollment ) Inclusion Criteria Study participant : 1 . Practicing boardcertified urologic surgeon 2 . Performing least 40 radical prostate surgery annually Exclusion Criteria Study Participants : ( 1 ) Did meet inclusion criterion Criteria ( Case selection ) Inclusion Criteria Case File : Patient case eligible study treat radical prostatectomy one adverse pathological feature present define : Pathological Gleason score > = 8 Gleason score 7 primary pattern 4 ; Pathological stage T3A ( = Extraprostatic extension ) T3B ( =Seminal vesicle invasion ) ; Positive surgical margin Gleason grade upgrade biopsy surgery Exclusion Criteria Case File : Metastatic disease ( M+ ) prior surgery Received neoadjuvant prostate cancer treatment radical prostatectomy ( radiation , hormone , chemotherapy )
